DocAttribute.Name: ConnectionGeometry
DocAttribute.Documentation: The geometric shape representation of the connection geometry that is provided in the object coordinate system of the _RelatingElement_ (mandatory) and in the object coordinate system of the _RelatedElement_ (optionally).

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingElement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to a subtype of _IfcElement_ that is connected by the connection relationship in the role of _RelatingElement_.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedElement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to a subtype of _IfcElement_ that is connected by the connection relationship in the role of _RelatedElement_.

DocWhereRule.Name: NoSelfReference
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The instance of the _RelatingElement_ shall not be the same instance as the _RelatedElement_.
